text: Kukwakwe nikwakuujila kwenu ŵanaose, (achi ni) chilanga cha Allah chakuonaonape. Chisimu Jwalakwe nijwaakutandisyaga gumba iwumbe, kaneka chachiyiusyausya (kuigumba panyuma pakuwa) kuti akaalipile mwa chilungamiko aŵala ŵaakulupilile nikutendaga yambone, sano aŵala ŵaakanile akwete kupata yakumwa ya mesi gamasemule nnope ni ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope ligongo lya ukafili wao uŵaliji nkutenda
